#include<bits/stdc++.h>

 using namespace std;

 int main(){
    long tt;
    //ifstream cin("a.txt");
    cin>>tt;
    int n;
    while(tt--){
        cin>>n;
        int r = n%7;
        int ans = n/7;
        ans*=7;
        r%=4;
        if(ans-(r*7)>=0){
            ans-=r*7;
            cout<<ans<<endl;
        }
        else
            cout<<"-1"<<endl;

    }

 }
